title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Hello! I want to tell you about our product for your work. Our product is called DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit. It is yellow and black color. This kit is good for many things you need to do.

The kit has two tools inside. One is the Drill/Driver, model DCD771. It can go 0, 450, or 1500 RPM, this means how fast it spins. It is strong with 300 UWO. This tool is not big and heavy, it is easy to carry. The part where you put the drill bit is 1/2-inch size and it closes with ratcheting that is only one sleeve. The handle is made to fit your hand well.

The second tool is the Impact Driver, model DCF885. It is very small, only 5.55 inches long, and it is light, only 2.8 pounds. The part where you put bits is 1/4-inch hex size. You can put bits with one hand. It holds bits that are 1-inch size. This tool has lights. It has 3 LEDs and they stay on for 20 seconds after you stop using it.

Both tools come with good lights on the bottom to help you see what you are working on better.

For power, we give you two batteries. They are 20V and Lithium Ion type. They are not heavy and last a long time. You also get a charger to make batteries full again when they are empty.

This kit is very good for many jobs where you need to make holes or put things together with screws. In the box, you will get the Drill/Driver, the Impact Driver, two batteries, and one charger.

Thank you for reading about our DEWALT tools. They are strong and easy to use and will help you do your work.

Hello and good day to you. We are bringing for sale a powerful tool kit for work that needs strong tools. This is the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit. The color is Yellow and Black, very nice to see, and the model number is DCK240C2.

Inside this kit, you get two tools. One is Drill/Driver, model DCD771, it has two speed settings for different works, 0 to 450 and 0 to 1500 RPM. This motor is good, it gives 300 unit watts out (UWO). It is not heavy and big, because it is compact and lightweight. The place to hold, the handle, is easy and comfortable. The chuck, where you put the drill bit, is 1/2-inch and it is a single sleeve ratcheting type.

The second tool is the Impact Driver, model DCF885. It is not long, only 5.55 inches, and it weighs 2.8 pounds. Easy to use with one hand when you put the bit in the chuck, which is 1/4-inch hex size. It can take 1-inch bit tips. It has a light ring with 3 LEDs and they stay on for 20 seconds after you stop pressing the trigger. This helps you see what you are doing without shadows.

Both tools come with 20V MAX batteries. You get two of these Lithium Ion batteries. They are strong to last long for your work. The kit also includes a charger so you can charge the batteries when they need more power.

There are more things that are good about these tools. They have an LED foot light for seeing better in dark places. These tools are good for many kinds of work, they are strong and reliable.

When you buy this kit, you get one DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, one DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, two 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and one Charger. All these come in the box for you.

We hope you like this tool kit and find it useful for your work. Thank you for looking at our product.
